channel.title: Question
channel.description: How do I make it so whenever I update the client, I want them to download the new one. So what I want it to do is I want to do the ::update *time* command and then once it logs everyone out, when they try to log in with the old client, it says "The *server name* client has been updated! Please download the new client at *forums link*!", and once they download the new one, they can log in with that.

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @HonorScape HonorScape
item.description:
@HonorScape wrote:

How do I make it so whenever I update the client, I want them to download the new one. So what I want it to do is I want to do the ::update time command and then once it logs everyone out, when they try to log in with the old client, it says “The server name client has been updated! Please download the new client at forums link!”, and once they download the new one, they can log in with that.

Read full topic
